scripts.start: npm run build-assets && npm run minify && node server.js
scripts.start-dev: npm run watch & npm run live-reload & nodemon server.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
scripts.watch-js: mkdir -p static/scripts && watchify src/main.coffee --transform coffeeify --extension=".coffee" --outfile static/scripts/bundle.js --verbose --debug
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p static/scripts && browserify src/main.coffee --transform coffeeify --extensions=".coffee" --outfile static/scripts/bundle.js
scripts.build-css: mkdir -p static/css && npm run copy-darkly && npm run sassify
scripts.build-assets: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
